attributes.action: Debate Obama being allowed to tell to the UK people how to vote in a referendum.
attributes.background: President Obama was recently asked by the Prime Minister to comment on how the British people should vote in a UK referendum. The President misrepresented the LEAVE campaign and likened it to "isolationism" but the US has the same isolationist policies and would not accept EU law in the US.

rejection.details: The views of the President of the USA are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
